gurmukhi: byd purwn kqyb kurwn; hsyb Qky kr hwQ n Awey ]
transliteration: Bed Puraan Kateb Kuraan Haseb Thake Kar Haath Na Aae||
translation: The Vedas, Puranas, Katebs and the Quran have tired of giving His account, but the Lord could not be comprehended.

gurmukhi: pUrn pRym pRBwau ibnw; piq isau, ikn sRI pdmwpiq pwey ]3]
transliteration: Pooran Prem Prabhaao Binaa Pat(i) Sio Kin Sroo Padmaa Pat(i) Paae||3||245||
translation: Without the impact of perfect love, who hath realized Lord-God with grace? 3.245.

gurmukhi: Awid AnMq AgwD AdÍYK; su BUq Biv`K Bvwn ABY hY ]
transliteration: Aadh Anant Agaddh Advaikh Su Bhoot Bhavikkh Bhavaan Abhai Hai||
translation: The Primal, Infinite, Unfathomable Lord is without malice and is fearless in the past, present and future.

gurmukhi: AMiq ibhIn Anwqm Awp; Adwg AdoK AiC`dR ACY hY ]
transliteration: Ant(i) Bihoon Anaatam Aap Adaag Adokh Achhiddra Achhai Hai||
translation: He is endless, Himself Selfless, stainless, blemishless, flawless and invincible.

gurmukhi: logn ky krqw hrqw; jl mY, Ql mY, Brqw pRB vY hY ]
transliteration: Logad Ke Kartaa Hartaa Jal Mai Thal Mai Bhartaa Prabh Vai Hai||
translation: He is the Creator and Destroyer of all in water and on land and also their Sustainer-Lord.

gurmukhi: dIn dieAwl dieAw kr sRI piq; suMdr sRI pdmwpiq ey hY ]4]
transliteration: Doon Daeaal Daeaa Kar Sroo Pat(i) Soundar Sroo Padmaa Pat(i) E Hai||4||246||
translation: He, the Lord of maya, is Compassionate to the Lowly, source of Mercy and most beautiful.4.246.

gurmukhi: kwm n k®oD n loB n moh n; rog n sog n Bog n BY hY ]
transliteration: Kaam Na Krodh Na Lobh Na Moh Na Rog Na Sog Nab Hog Na Bhai Hai||
translation: He is without lust, anger, greed, attachment, ailment, sorrow, enjoyment and fear.

gurmukhi: dyh ibhIn, snyh sBo qn; nyh ibrkq Agyh ACY hY ]
transliteration: Deh Bihoon Saneh Sabho Tan Neh Birkat Ageh Achhai Hai||
translation: He is body-less, loving everybody but without worldly attachment, invincible and cannot be held in grasp.

gurmukhi: jwn ko dyq, Ajwn ko dyq; jmIn ko dyq, jmwn ko dY hY ]
transliteration: Jaan Ko Det Ajaan Ko Det Jamoond Ko Det Jamaan Ko Dai Hai||
translation: He provides sustenance to all animate and inanimate beings and all those living on the earth and in the sky.

gurmukhi: kwhy ko folq hY, qumrI suD; suMdr sRI pdmwpiq lY hY ]5]
transliteration: Kaahe Ko Dolat Hai Toumroo Sudh Soundar Sroo Padmaa Pat(i) Laihai||5||247||
translation: Why dost thou waver, O creature! The beautiful Lord of maya will take care of thee. 5.247.

gurmukhi: rogn qy Ar sogn qy; jl jogn qy, bhu BWiq bcwvY ]
transliteration: Rogad Te Ar Sogad Te Jal Jogad Te Bahu Bhaant(i) Badhaavai||
translation: He protects in many blows, but none doth inflict thy body.

gurmukhi: s`qR Anyk clwvq Gwv; qaU qn eyk n lwgn pwvY ]
transliteration: Sattru Anek Chadaavat Ghaav Taoo Tan Ek Na Laagad Paavai||
translation: The enemy strikes many blows, but none doth inflict thy body.

gurmukhi: rwKq hY, Apno kr dY kr; pwp sbUh, n Bytn pwvY ]
transliteration: Raakhat Hai Apno Kar Dai Kar Paap Sanbooh Na Bhetan Paavai||
translation: When the Lord protects with his own hands, but none of the sins even comes near thee.

gurmukhi: AOr kI bwq khw kh qo sO; su pyt hI ky pt bIc bcwvY ]6]
transliteration: Aur Koo Baat Kahaa Kah To Saoun Su Pet Hoo Ke Pat Boodhe Badhaavai||6||248||
translation: What else should I say unto you, He protects (the infant) even in the membranes of the womb.6.248.
